sentences.en: Don't be fooled by all his complimentary remarks — they were all said with tongue in cheek.
sentences.cn: 别让他的恭维话给蒙骗住了——那些话可不能当真.

sentences.en: Everyone had been most complimentary about the costumes.
sentences.cn: 大家对这些服装赞不绝口.

sentences.en: Her lungs rattled worse than this complimentary bus.
sentences.cn: 她肺部的哮喘声比这辆汽车引吭高唱的赞歌还响.

sentences.en: His remarks were the reverse of complimentary.
sentences.cn: 他所说的话与恭维话恰恰相反.

sentences.en: I presumed the bottled water in the room was complimentary.
sentences.cn: 我以为房间内的瓶装水是免费的.

sentences.en: I've got complimentary tickets for the theatre.
I’ve got some complimentary tickets for the theatre tonight.
sentences.cn: 我有几张今晚的免费戏票。

sentences.en: My boss was very complimentary about my work.
sentences.cn: 老板对我的工作极其称赞.

sentences.en: She made some highly complimentary remarks about their school.
sentences.cn: 她对他们的学校给予高度的评价.

sentences.en: She was highly complimentary about my paintings.
sentences.cn: 她对我的画给予了高度评价.

sentences.en: Such remarks were scarcely complimentary toward the officers present.
sentences.cn: 这种话已经把在场的军官们贬得一钱不值了.

sentences.en: The staff have been very complimentary, and so have the customers.
sentences.cn: 员工们对此大加赞扬，顾客们也一样。

sentences.en: The supermarket operates a complimentary shuttle service.
sentences.cn: 这家超市提供免费购物班车.

sentences.en: There was a complimentary bottle of champagne in the hotel room.
sentences.cn: 酒店客房里有一瓶免费赠送的香槟。

sentences.en: These complimentary expressions were uttered in a somewhat absent and distracted manner.
sentences.cn: 这些谀词出口的时候好象有些心不在焉精神错乱的样子.

sentences.en: We often get complimentary remarks regarding the cleanliness of our patio.
sentences.cn: 我们经常听人称赞我们的露台非常干净。

words.tran_cn: 恭维；称赞；问候；致意；道贺
